data.name: Ryclaw: Hope
data.detailed_description:
Ryclaw: Hope is a short visual novel set in the Ryclaw Heroes universe.

Alien attacks have left the city of Denton in shambles and many of its residents in desperate need. You play as a young college student inspired to find ways to help your community rebuild and rebound from disaster. Inspired by the selflessness of a volunteer named Hope, you discover a world of service and make friends along the way.

Features a supporting cast of interesting characters and multiple endings based on your decisions.
